page.title: 15CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: At home, we have different games,{} the most popular of these being the{ {computer.}Eleven of the thirteen pupils in our school have home computers. The favourite computer game is called 'Felix in the Factory' (Felix gets chased by the Gremlins) and 'Hunchback' (where the Hunchback has to rescue Esmerelda). Some people have programs to help them with their maths. Indoor games like{Lego, board {games, cars}and{dolls}are popular. Most people have{bicycles}and we spend a lot of time playing on these. We also play on{go-carts}down the school hill. They are made out of wood and old pram wheels. Some people play 'Cops and Robbers.' When the robbers have been caught, they become the cops and the game starts again.
